## What protocol area?
- [ ] custody
- [ ] hee

## Problem Statement
What breaks today? What gap exists?

Describe the change at the protocol level (not consumer implementation).

## Compatibility / Migration
Is this additive? Does it require versioning?

## Abuse Resistance
How might this be exploited or misused? What mitigations exist?
